original_text: And the angel thrust in his sickle into the earth, and gathered the vine of the earth, and cast it into the great winepress of the wrath of God.
korean_text: 천사가 낫을 땅에 휘둘러 땅의 포도를 거두어 하나님의 진노의 큰 포도주 틀에 던지매

sentences.original_text: And the angel thrust in his sickle into the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 천사가 그의 낫을 땅에 찔러 넣었고

sentences.original_text: and gathered the vine of the earth
and cast it into the great winepress
